spiritsExplanation: The workout 'Power Climb Row' is conducted outdoors on a river, as evidenced by the image and title, which aligns it with an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit (score: 0.9). The description suggests an emphasis on rhythm and endurance, fondly matching "Flow & Rhythm" by mentioning "climbing in rhythm" and using indie and global hits music to maintain flow (score: 0.75). The workout involves structured pressure application and a measurable format "climb" which denotes a methodical approach, hinting at a "Structured & Disciplined" spirit (score: 0.6). The medium intensity (2 out of 3) and categories like 'Sweat' and 'Row' support a robust, engaging session but not intense enough to classify as "High-Energy & Intense." Therefore, the primary spirits, in consideration of the natural setting and rhythmic focus, are "Outdoor & Adventure," "Flow & Rhythm," and "Structured & Disciplined."
